prd_title: MTL UI Terminology and Form Integration

post_release_fixes.issue: MTL amounts displayed as 100x inflated (e.g., $300,000 instead of $3,000)
post_release_fixes.root_cause: Financial transactions store amounts in cents but MTL expects dollars. Bridge trigger and direct MTL creation were using cents.
fixes: hooks/rating-slip-modal/use-save-with-buyin.ts: Changed MTL entry creation from `newBuyIn * 100` to `newBuyIn` (dollars)

post_release_fixes.issue: MTL vs CTR tracking conflated in gaming-day-summary.tsx banner
post_release_fixes.root_cause: Banner counted CTR triggers (agg_ctr_met > $10k aggregate) but labeled as 'MTL Thresholds Met'. Per GAP-MTL-UI-TERMINOLOGY, MTL is single-transaction threshold (>= $3k), not aggregate.
fixes: components/mtl/gaming-day-summary.tsx: Added separate MTL banner (amber) showing patron count with MTL threshold met (row existence = single transaction >= $3k). CTR banner (red) now correctly labeled as 'CTR Triggers' showing aggregate > $10k.
